data.comment: Emmen kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! Bruno Martins Indi gives Alkmaar a 1-0 lead in Alkmaar.
In the minute 11, That's a fine assist from Pantelis Chatzidiakos.
The second-half is underway. Alkmaar with the kick-off.
In the minute 60, Lucas Bernadou (Emmen) has been shown a straight red card by referee Marc Nagtegaal.
Caner Cavlan (Emmen) has received a yellow card from Marc Nagtegaal.
Donis Avdijaj is replacing Anco Jansen for the away team.
In the minute 65, The home team replace Jesper Karlsson with Myron Boadu.
Zakaria Aboukhlal is on a sub for Albert Gudmundsson for Alkmaar.
Emmen make their second substitution with Lentini Caciano replacing Simon Tibbling.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Nikolai Laursen with Marko Kolar. This is the third substitution made today by Dick Lukkien.
Teun Koopmeiners (Alkmaar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jonas Svensson is booked for the home team.
The match has come to a close in Alkmaar. The final score is 1-0.
